title: Drawing, 1923-41-4, 1877
medium: Charcoal, black and white chalk on gray paper.
signed: Signed with [initials or monogram ?] and dated in black chalk ?, at lower right: F.H.S. 77
provenance: Gift of Mrs. F. Hopkinson Smith

description: Horizontal view of a field with a fenc in the foreground and a clump of three trees under which some cows are resting.
